Unit tests for Modhex.

Author:
Arne

Constructor Summary
ModhexTest()
           Constructor.
 
Method Summary
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
           Runs tests.
 void testModhexRandomArray()
           Tests that a random array of 1000 bytes encodes to valid Modhex String and decodes back to same byte array.
 void testModhexRandomUpperCaseArray()
           Same test as testModhexRandomArray() but Modhex String is converted to all upper case before decoded.
